thread.title: Record heat and increased smoke for our region
thread.title_full: Record heat and increased smoke for our region

title: Record heat and increased smoke for our region
text: [] Record heat and increased smoke for our region EXCESSIVE HEAT WARNING with record high tamps today with 104 for Spokane. Weather Alert Day for today and Saturday with triple digit heat. Upper 90s Sunday and Monday with a slight cool down later next week to low 90s. COPYRIGHT 2024 BY KXLY. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED. THIS MATERIAL MAY NOT BE PUBLISHED, BROADCAST, REWRITTEN OR REDISTRIBUTED.
